version_description:
We’ve been hard at work to make Shopify Ping better everyday! In this update, you’ll find more fixes and improvements under the hood that help to keep your conversations running smoothly.

We love hearing from you! Please let us know what you think of Shopify Ping by leaving a review.

Get more done in Ping: we've added the ability to mark conversations as done so you can clear them out of your home screen and keep it tidy. Give it a try by swiping right on any conversation or by tapping the checkmark inside a conversation.

Conversations on your home screen are also now known as active conversations. When you receive a new message, that conversation is marked active for you to respond to.

We've made other improvements as well:
• Push notifications now bring you directly into the conversation
• Kit's email previews load much faster and more reliably
• Performance has been improved throughout

We value your feedback! Please let us know what you think of Shopify Ping by leaving a review.

Here's what you'll find in version 1.2:

• Now you can search for conversations by customer name, to make it easy to get back to important conversations when your inbox gets full. Just pull down to reveal the search box and give it a try!
• We've added iOS 12 support, for all of you who are already running the latest and greatest from Apple.
• We've fixed bugs for greater app stability, and added some design improvements.

Increase your conversions by sharing discount codes in your customer conversations! This update allows you to access you store's discount codes in Shopify Ping and share them with just a few taps.

APPLE BUSINESS CHAT

We've partnered with Apple to let customers contact you with the Messages app on their iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Now you can let customers chat with you as they shop, improving your chances of making a sale. With Apple Pay, they can even complete purchases without leaving the conversation. Apple Business Chat makes interacting with your business as easy as texting friends and family.

SHOPIFY CHAT
Ping now offers Shopify Chat, a live chat tool that lets visitors contact you while they’re browsing your online store.

Best of all, Shopify Chat and Apple Business Chat work together. Based on your visitor’s device and browser, we’ll determine the best chat option to display. A single dynamic chat button that keeps your store uncluttered, and a simpler way for shoppers to contact you – no matter what device they use.
